resources.string: We\’ve noticed you switched to a different device
Switching to a new device will permanently lock you out from any other device.
You can now use your MoviePass card to purchase your ticket!
If asked, provide this zip code.
You are offline. Please check your internet connection.
You must grant these permissions to use MoviePass
Not ready to Sign Up? Explore the app
Have a MoviePass Supported E-ticketing Theater Near You?
Your MoviePass card is accepted in\nover 4000 theaters nationwide!
You can see any 2D movie from its first day of release.
Sign up, get your MoviePass card in the\nmail, and you\'re ready to go!
Use the app to check into a theater,\nthen swipe your card to get your ticket!
You can reserve same-day e-tickets right on the app from any location, even before receiving your card.*
You can now use your MoviePass card to purchase tickets at the theater!
Search the App for Movies, Theaters & Showtimes
There are no advanced reservations; same-day ticket sales only.
Go to a Theater, Select a Screening, Click \"Check In\"
You must be within 100 yards of the theater in order to check in.
Use your MoviePass Card to Purchase Your Ticket!
You have 30 minutes to swipe your card at a kiosk, or with a ticket agent.
Movie Sold Out? Changed Your Mind?
Press “Cancel Check-In,” and pick something new.
Please select a seat before checking in

You have selected an access space designated for disabled individuals.


Tap OK to select or CANCEL to select another seat.

You have selected a seat designated for companions of disabled individuals, who require accessible seating because of a mobility disability.


Tap OK to select or CANCEL to select another seat.
Check Your Connection And Try Again
Please check your credentials and try again
Scan your finger to sign in.
Invite your friends to join MoviePass
Your first three friends to sign up for MoviePass get their first month for free!
Sign up and get your MoviePass!
Not ready to sign up? Explore the app
Available at over 4,000 theaters in the U.S.
What movie do you want to see?
We need you to verify your ticket purchase
Please, take a photo of your ticket
Please tell us why you weren\'t able to submit your ticket.
In the future please submit pictures of your ticket stubs. Your account status could be affected if you fail to do so.

Please take a picture of your ticket stub after using your MoviePass card to get your ticket. Follow the prompt provided to submit a photo of the ticket any time before seeing your next movie with MoviePass.
Your account status could be affected if you do not submit pictures of your ticket stubs in the future.
This screening is not a supported MoviePass screening.
Start seeing movies to begin your reservation history
Click here to verify your ticket purchase
After you have purchased your ticket with your MoviePass card please take a picture of your ticket stub. You will not be able to proceed in the app or see another movie with MoviePass until doing so.
Before you can proceed in the app or see another movie with MoviePass you must verify your last ticket purchase. Please take a picture of your last movie ticket stub.
We\'ll never post without your permission.
Please enter a valid address line 2
Please enter a valid address line 2
New password can not be the same as the current password
Tell us where to send your MoviePass card
Please enter a valid address line 2
Please enter a valid zip code
You will be charged $9.95 today, and your first month of service will begin when you receive your MoviePass card in the mail.
Please allow 7 business days for shipping
My billing address is the same as my shipping address
You must agree with the terms and conditions to sign up
You signed up successfully! Keep an eye out for your card in the mail. You can start seeing movies in e-ticketing theaters immediately.
today, and your first month of service will begin when you receive your MoviePass card in the mail, or upon your first e-ticket check-in (whichever comes first).

string.name: fragment_sign_up_step_three_bottom_disclaimer_part_three
string.b: Please allow up to two weeks for shipping your card.

resources.string: Enter the last four digits of your MoviePass card.
Please enter your MoviePass card\'s last four digits.
Your MoviePass card has been activated successfully
Sorry, the four digits you entered do not match with last four digits of your MoviePass card
Sorry, we\'re having trouble activating your card. Please live chat with Customer Service
You must activate your MoviePass card before checking into this theater
You\'ll need to activate your card before using MoviePass at certain theaters. Explore the app in the mean time!
Zip code can not be empty.
Your first month will begin when you receive your MoviePass card
Your MoviePass account will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
*Exception made when redeeming a gift subscription that carries from an active month to month subscription.
Please note that if you cancel your account you will not be able to reactivate your account or start a new subscription for 9 months.*
Click the camera below to take a picture of your MoviePass card.
You can still check in to theaters that support e-ticketing, or explore the app while waiting for your card to arrive.

Flix is primarily adult-oriented. Those 17 and older may see any show any time.

If you are 6 to 16: You are good to go for all rated G, PG and PG‌-13 shows as long as you are with a parent or responsible adult. It isn’t really appropriate for you to see rated R motion pictures though.

If you are 2 to 5: You can see all G, PG and PG‌-13 movies that start before 7pm, but not after. Infants, toddlers and strollers are only allowed during special “Flix Family Day” events.

We begin seating approximately 30 minutes prior to showtime in order to provide food and beverage service before the feature begins. We do not seat late arrivals after the feature begins, so you will not be able to see the show if you are not on time.
Sign into this loyalty program with your membership card number.
Add a movie theater loyalty program to your MoviePass account by selecting a program from the list above.

plurals.name: reservation_code_description
plurals.item: Use the code below to redeem your ticket
Use the code below to redeem all of the tickets in this reservation.
Use the code below to redeem all of the tickets in this reservation.

resources.string: Use the code below to redeem your tickets
This code can also be found in your account under “Current Reservation”
You can now use your MoviePass card to purchase your ticket!
If asked, provide this zip code:
You have 30 minutes to use your MoviePass card to purchase your ticket!
There are no more screenings at this theater today
There are no more screenings today
Click here to check in to a movie that is playing at this theater, but isn\'t appearing on the app.
This premium screening is not supported
Your guests may be eligible for a FREE\n ticket if they join MoviePass!
You will be charged the listed ticket price for every guest that does not subscribe to MoviePass.
A %1$s convenience fee is charged for each guest in your reservation. Convenience fees are non-refundable, and will not be reimbursed as a part of the “Free Guest” policy.

At this time e-tickets can’t be cancelled or changed. There are no refunds for guest tickets.\n\nBe sure this is the movie, showtime and theater you want to attend before completing the checkout process.
You can cancel e-tickets up until 5 minutes before showtime and receive a refund on all guest tickets.\n\nGuest convenience fees are not refundable.

Guests must be at least 18 years of age and must not be current or former MoviePass members to qualify. Each guest for whom you provide an email address will be sent an email with information on how to sign up for MoviePass.

You earn reimbursement of the ticket price for each qualified guest who signs up for MoviePass within 24 hours after the showtime of the movie to which you invited them, and activates their MoviePass account within 30 days from sign up (when they receive and activate their MoviePass card, or use MoviePass to check into a supported e-ticketing theater, whichever occurs first). Both steps are required.

Reimbursement (excluding the non–refundable $1.50 ticket convenience fee) will be applied to your card within about 3–5 business days after the guest activates their new MoviePass account.

No responsibility is assumed for undeliverable emails to guests due to improper email address, prior opt-out by the guest from commercial emails from MoviePass, or any other reason. Offer valid only for limited screenings at participating theaters. Maximum four (4) guests per reservation. MoviePass reserves the right to terminate any promotional offer at any time.
Are you sure you want to exit?

\nYou will be reimbursed the ticket price (excluding convenience fee) for each adult guest (18 +) that signs up for MoviePass within 24 hours after the movie’s showtime and then activates their new MoviePass account within 30 days from sign up. Adult guests will be sent email instructions on how to sign up for MoviePass.
Would you like to send this promotion to your guests?
$1.50 convenience fee applies per guest ticket
The following guests are current or former MoviePass members, or on our do-not-email list. No reimbursements can be applied for these guests:\n\n
I acknowledge that all of the above guests are 18 years of age or older.

You must acknlowedge that all emails belong to guests 18 years of age or older.
If asked, provide this zip code:
E-Tickets at this theater cannot be cancelled or changed. No refunds will be issued.
In order to use the MoviePass app please enable location services in your phone’s settings.
There are no more screenings at this theater today
This device is no longer authorized.
E-Tickets at this theater cannot be cancelled or changed. There are no refunds for any charges associated with this reservation (if applied).
Please describe what went wrong with your ticket verification process.
DO NOT TAKE A PICTURE OF YOUR RECEIPT
This payment method will be applied to all in-app purchases as well as monthly membership fees*
*Monthly membership fees do not apply to gift and annual subscriptions
This showtime is now at Peak Pricing. There will be a surcharge of %1$s for your ticket.
This showtime is now at Peak Pricing. There will be a surcharge of
This showtime is nearing Peak Pricing. There is no surcharge if you check-in at this time, but a surcharge of
This showtime is nearing Peak Pricing. There is no surcharge if you check-in at this time, but a surcharge of %1$s could be added soon.
This showtime is nearing Peak Pricing. There is no surcharge if you check-in at this time, but a surcharge could be added soon.

You will be charged the above amount after redeeming your ticket. Once you press “submit” you’ll have 30 minutes to redeem your ticket at the above price. If you cancel or change this check-in before redeeming your ticket your transaction will be cancelled and you will not be charged.

You can cancel your check-in before using your MoviePass card to purchase your ticket. You will not be charged for any showtime specific surcharges if you cancel your check-in. \n\nThere are no refunds for surcharges once a ticket is purchased using your MoviePass card.

Your payment for your last reservation was declined. Please update your payment information in “Account Details”. \n\nYou’ll be able to check into your next movie the day after updating your payment details.
Confirm the last 4 digits of your card
You account will remain active until %1$s (paid through date).
Are you sure you want to cancel your membership?
After you have purchased your ticket with your MoviePass card please take a picture of your ticket stub. You will not be able to proceed in the app or see another movie with MoviePass until doing so.
DO NOT TAKE A PICTURE OF YOUR RECEIPT
Please enable the CAMERA permission from the App info / Permissions settings screen.
There is low storage, please free up space on your device.
In order to view theaters & showtimes, location services must be enabled.
search city & state or zip code
There was a problem with your request.\n\nPlease try again.
The last day your account will be active is on
Please choose a reason for cancellation from the dropdown menu provided.
Apply your Peak Pass to bypass this Peak Pricing surcharge.
This showtime is now at peak pricing and there will be an added surcharge of %1$s.\n\nYou have a Peak Pass and can choose to bypass this surcharge.
This showtime is now at peak pricing and there will be an added surcharge of %1$s.\n\nYou do not have a Peak Pass.

You can apply a Peak Pass to bypass a Peak Pricing surcharge. Just choose “Apply My Peak Pass” upon pressing “Continue” after choosing a showtime.\n\nYou get one Peak Pass a month. Peak Passes do not roll over. If you cancel your check-in or e-ticket reservation your Peak Pass will be added back to your account.
You\'ll receive your next Peak Pass on %1$s

You can apply a Peak Pass to bypass a Peak Pricing surcharge. Just choose “Apply My Peak Pass” upon pressing “Continue” after choosing a showtime.\n\nYou get one Peak Pass a month. Peak Passes do not roll over. If you cancel your check-in or e-ticket reservation your Peak Pass will be added back to your account.
All members get 1 Peak Pass a month which allows you to bypass one Peak Pricing surcharge.
Just choose “Apply My Peak Pass” upon pressing “Continue” after choosing a showtime.
Peak Passes do not roll over. If you cancel your check-in your Peak Pass will be added back to your account.
You have already seen %1$d movies this month, but you can pay for your ticket via MoviePass and receive a
off the theater’s listed ticket price.
Your next pass will be applied on %1$s
Your current Peak Pass expires on %1$s
Be the first to hear about new movies, features, and promotions from MoviePass
Your billing details have been changed.
Movies left in current billing cycle:
Continue seeing movies with the MoviePass Discount!

You have seen three movies this month, but you can still check into showtimes with MoviePass. Your billing card on file will be charged the theater’s listed ticket price, and you will receive a discount by paying through the MoviePass app.
Continue seeing discounted movies with MoviePass until your cycle renews!
Your plan monthly cap was met
A valid email address is required
There was an error processing this request. Please try again.

I agree that once I redeem my ticket using my MoviePass card I will be charged the theater’s listed ticket price for this showtime, minus the MoviePass discount.\n\nIf you cancel this check-in, or never redeem your ticket by swiping your MoviePass card, you will not be charged.

I agree that I will be charged the theater’s listed ticket price for this showtime, minus the MoviePass discount.\n\nE-Tickets at this theater cannot be cancelled or changed. No refunds will be issued.

Your billing card on file will be charged the theater’s listed adult ticket price for this showtime, minus the $2 MoviePass discount. A receipt will be emailed to you as a record for this transaction.\n\nIf you cancel this check-in before redeeming your ticket your transaction will be cancelled and you will not be charged.
Your billing card on file will be charged the theater’s listed ticket price for this showtime, minus the above MoviePass discount. A receipt will be emailed to you as a record for this transaction.
Your billing card on file will be charged the above amount

You can cancel your check-in before using your MoviePass card to redeem your ticket. No charges associated with this check-in will be charged if you cancel the check-in, or never swipe your MoviePass card.
There are no refunds once a ticket is redeemed using your MoviePass card.

MoviePass receives the ticket price for this showtime after the transaction has gone through.\n\nPlease check your theater for the price of this ticket. You will be charged the theater’s ticket price minus the MoviePass discount.
Your billing card on file will be charged the theater’s listed ticket price for this showtime, minus the above MoviePass discount. A receipt will be emailed to you as a record for this transaction.
Guests have a chance to go FREE!
